text: Are if/else statements workable in email modules? I'd like to set up a module so that users choose between 2 layouts (image on left, image on right) using if statements to select between two specific code blocks

Having trouble making a newsletter and to have unique links, like how one would do it in a webpage. I am able to get the prompt in the UI but it doesnt seem to apply any CTAs in the designated spot. Any advice?

Does CTAs need to be manually set up for email? Like how one would make Module and need to edit from 'PAGE' to 'EMAIL'? because I couldn't find anything
